text: Hi Everyone! Is it possible to fetch all child tables data from the parent table ?
That’s what I thought might be the case. Thanks, Gobi. Appreciate the response!
You can but if the relationship is simple you are better of with the foreign id relationship.. you can call that relationship without separately querying 2 tables...

Hi all, I'm building a multipage HubDB listing system. Currently my website page has a parent table attached to it and uses a HubDB module to spoin up child rows. Clicking on a child element, leads to a dynamic page. How do I go about defining the template for JUST these child rows
